tool_description: An API showing all of the latest US 2024 Election Candidate News Live.
name: US 2024 Election Candidate Live News
title: US 2024 Election Candidate Live News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about the US Presidential Election from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-2024-election-candidate-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/npr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-2024-election-candidate-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-2024-election-candidate-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-2024-election-candidate-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Election News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about the US Election 2024.
